name: Dux TD
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dux TD is a Tower Defense Game with... Ducks.

VOLUME CONTROL: Show the Music Control setting in the corner by turning it on and off with the V and W keys!

Build up your army consisting of 3 variants of ducks!

Face off against the wrath of waves of unique coconuts, breaking down to 3 unique coconuts. If you want to, think of it as 1 duck to 1 coconut.

Play off against the Coconuts in 2 different and uniquely styled maps!

Face your frights and challenge the game with HARDCORE Mode!

Save yourself a second with Autoplay Mode, which starts a round immediately after the last one has ended if enabled.

Buy yourself more lives (or eggs, rather) if you have a huge chunk of cash and you think you're gonna lose!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dux TD will comfort you with its robust playing experience, including:

  • Widescreen Aspect Ratio (16:9 for 1080p displays)
  • Silky Smooth vector art, allowing for infinite upscaling
  • Controller Support (Xinput)
  • Nice and smooth Transition Screen
  • 60 FPS (smooth like butter) gameplay for a more eye-pleasing view
  • Immersive Title Screen, including a monument linking you to the predecessor of this game, Zen Tank TDS!
  • In-browser playability, allowing for play anywhere.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits can be found on the Newgrounds version!

Play on Newgrounds!
